events.name: So You Want to Be a UX Designer
events.description:
RSVP for free here: bit.ly/2lMI37a

Speakers:
Matthew Harper (Product/UX Director, Mesh & Codestream Pte Ltd)
Coleman Yee (Senior UX Consultant, DBS Bank. Living, Breathing Asia)
Ruth Ho (User Researcher, UX Consultant & UX Team Coach, The Collab Folks)

Considering a career as a UX designer? Curious about what a day-to-day job in UX looks like? Join General Assembly and NTUC to learn about what a day in the life entails for a UX designer!

Hear from a panel of UX designers as they tell all about their professional experience and see what it's like to work as one. We will explore different options for branching into UX design and discuss how UX designers are found and hired. We will also talk about the expectations you can have throughout your career and key areas of growth within the industry.

Join us and get acquainted with the field of UX design in Singapore.

The session is moderated by Bryant Tang (Career Coach, General Assembly).

events.name: March 2017 Meetup
events.description:
Please mark your attendance at https://www.meetup.com/WordPress-Singapore/events/237838089/

Talk 1: SEO and WordPress 
Speaker: Tommy Koh
Basic of SEO and usage of Yoast plugin

Talk 2: Setting up Analytics for WordPress 
Speaker: Robert Sim
Setting up Google Analytics through Google Tag Manager for WordPress

Community Open Space:  
Please comment (below) on topics you would like to discuss, experts & enthusiasts present will answer questions.

This will be casual.

Possible topics could be -

• What makes a good theme?? 

• My site loads slow, how do I make it faster? 

• And more (just comment) 

Are you interested in sharing something about WordPress as well? Let us know! 

Do join us from 7pm for a 7:30pm start.

We're always looking for speakers and volunteers to help with our meetups! Please contact us if you're interested in helping out. 

Please call Robert at 97847766 if you have an issue getting to the meetup. Do not abuse the number please :)

events.name: MeetUp with Hyperledger Executive Director Brian Behlendorf
events.description: Join this special event at 7pm featuring global Hyperledger Executive Director Brian Behlendorf giving the scoop on Hyperledger Project developments globally, plus an "ask me anything" style Q&A. Please see Brian’s bio below: -----  "Brian Behlendorf is Executive Director of the Hyperledger Project, a collaborative technology initiative hosted by the Linux Foundation. Brian also currently serves on the Boards of the Mozilla Foundation and Benetech, and is the Chairman of the Board of the Electronic Frontier Foundation. Brian organized and served as the Founding President of the Apache Software Foundation, a 501c3 non-profit that organizes volunteer software development projects around key Internet technologies, helping ensure an open and free marketplace. He once served as the CTO of the World Economic Forum and also founded and served as Chief Technology Officer of CollabNet, a company focused on bringing open source collaborative software development tools and methodologies into enterprise environments. He was a Managing Director at Mithril Capital Management, a growth-stage private equity fund, where he continues to serve as a Senior Technology Advisor." (World Economic Forum) https://www.hyperledger.org/about/leadership https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Behlendorf
